column5: We are very interested and serious applicants looking for employment within the service industry revolving around fishing and hunting. We are looking to assist and grow within the business providing excellent client relations and customer service. If interested please reply and we will be more than happy to send you a introduction letter and resume. If you may have any further questions or concerns please feel free to contact us directly. Look forward to your response Email [email protected]

Greetings,Have you checked out the following website for NOTO (Nature and Outdoor Tourism Ontario): http://noto.ca/?I understand that there is a bulletin board that can be used to post jobs available or job wanted advertisements. This might be under the tab (near the bottom of the list) for Discussion Board. I recollect that my lodge owner friends sometimes looked for employees on this website.Good luck on your job search!Kindest regards...
Yes we are both Canadian citizens.
